scripts.syms: node --harmony _cli.js -l data/lib.es6.d.ts data/node.d.ts data/dom.es6.generated.d.ts data/esnext.promise.d.ts data/inspector.d.ts data/lib.es2017.intl.d.ts data/lib.es2017.object.d.ts data/lib.es2017.sharedmemory.d.ts data/lib.es2017.string.d.ts data/lib.es2017.typedarrays.d.ts data/lib.esnext.asynciterable.d.ts data/webworker.generated.d.ts >sym.json
scripts.show: node --harmony _cli.js data/lib.es6.d.ts data/node.d.ts data/dom.es6.generated.d.ts data/esnext.promise.d.ts data/inspector.d.ts data/lib.es2017.intl.d.ts data/lib.es2017.object.d.ts data/lib.es2017.sharedmemory.d.ts data/lib.es2017.string.d.ts data/lib.es2017.typedarrays.d.ts data/lib.esnext.asynciterable.d.ts data/webworker.generated.d.ts
scripts.symbols: npm-run-all es6 node dom promise inspector es2017
scripts.es2017: node --harmony _cli.js -l data/lib.es2017.intl.d.ts data/lib.es2017.object.d.ts data/lib.es2017.sharedmemory.d.ts data/lib.es2017.string.d.ts data/lib.es2017.typedarrays.d.ts data/lib.esnext.asynciterable.d.ts data/webworker.generated.d.ts >resources/es2017.json
scripts.reader: node --harmony _cli.js data/lib.es6.d.ts data/node.d.ts data/dom.es6.generated.d.ts data/esnext.promise.d.ts data/inspector.d.ts data/lib.es2017.intl.d.ts data/lib.es2017.object.d.ts data/lib.es2017.sharedmemory.d.ts data/lib.es2017.string.d.ts data/lib.es2017.typedarrays.d.ts data/lib.esnext.asynciterable.d.ts data/webworker.generated.d.ts
scripts.check: npm run lint -s && dependency-check package.json --entry index.js
scripts.test1: rm -rf node_modules/.cache coverage/ && node --harmony node_modules/.bin/nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --produce-source-map --require=esm mocha --harmony __tests__/tdd/interface-def-test.js
scripts.marktoc:
npx replace -s -q '### Changelog' '<!-- START doctoc -->\
<!-- END doctoc -->' CHANGELOG.md
scripts.docsite: npx documentation build index.js --infer-private='^_.*'  -f html -o docs
